settings.heading: The Most Trusted Brands In The Industry
settings.content: Fireside offers a complete product portfolio of gas, electric, and wood fireplace solutions and services for residential and commercial projects.

settings.title: Heat & Glo
settings.brand_desc: Heat & Glo products are innovative, safe, and beautifully styled to fit seamlessly with traditional and modern spaces. Available with heat management technology to make more installation options available than ever.

settings.title: Stellar by Heat & Glo
settings.brand_desc: Stellar combines bold creativity and advanced technology collaboratively with your vision. Create custom fireplaces from 4' - 22' wide, up to 6' tall, and in single, two, three or four-sides for both indoor and outdoor spaces.

settings.title: Heatilator
settings.brand_desc: Value mixed with dependability. Established in 1927, Heatilator has built a long-standing reputation for providing quality, dependable hearth products. Today, Heatilator remains the most preferred, recommended, and installed fireplace brand among building professionals.

settings.title: SimpliFire
settings.brand_desc: Electric fireplaces from SimpliFire provide more options than ever to add fireplaces to your projects, especially where venting, heat, space, or lot lines are a concern.

settings.title: Quadra-Fire
settings.brand_desc: Pure performance. Quadra-Fire is the heating source for any walk of life with an award-winning performance streak that's unrivaled in the industry. Its stunning flame and environmentally friendly emissions make Quadra-Fire a perfect addition to your home.

settings.title: Vermont Castings
settings.brand_desc: Passion and pride are infused into every element of Vermont Castings stoves, resulting in the timeless designs and furniture-quality finishes that are the hallmarks of American craftsmanship.

settings.title: Harman
settings.brand_desc: Harman pellet stoves are heating solutions built to withstand the test of time with reliable warmth and aesthetic elegance. Each and every product is designed for optimal performance and engineering excellence.

settings.title: Monessen
settings.brand_desc: Monessen offers vent free fireplaces, fireboxes, and gas log sets known for their unparalleled detail, lively flame, and abundant heat. A great way to add warmth and ambiance without extensive remodeling.

settings.title: Outdoor Lifestyles
settings.brand_desc: Completely transform outdoor living spaces with wood and gas outdoor fireplace options. High quality products designed to durably withstand sun, wind, rain, and snow.

settings.title: Outdoor GreatRoom
settings.brand_desc: The perfect addition to any outdoor space! Easily add Outdoor GreatRoom gas fire pit tables to patios, decks, and backyards. Certified for residential and commercial use and available in a variety of styles and sizes.

settings.title: Fireside Finishings
settings.brand_desc: With a broad range of wood mantels and stone selections, Fireside Finishings brings thoughtful details together to transform a simple fireplace into a beautiful showpiece. It's the finishing touch to make your projects truly stand out.

settings.title: Hearth & Home Technologies
settings.brand_desc: The leader in an award-winning brand portfolio of fireplace products driven by safety and innovation.

settings.title: Explore Our Brands In Person
settings.content:
In addition to browsing our products online, you can also experience our stunning selection of fireplaces in person.

Showroom walk-ins are encouraged, or you can schedule an appointment to work directly with one of our fireplace experts. We'll help you find the right products and design to fit any application. We also offer free in-home or virtual consultations.
